forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. South southwest wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds beneath bright and mostly sunny skies, a delightful contrast to the fog-laden mornings typical of this city. The air is crisp yet inviting, with temperatures hovering around the mid-50s. The breeze, a gentle west-southwest whisper, rustles the leaves and brings a refreshing energy to the streets, making it a perfect day for a leisurely stroll to appreciate the architecture and vibrant life that fill the neighborhoods. 

As the sun begins its descent toward the horizon, clouds will weave into the fabric of the evening, heralding the rain that is expected after 11 PM. This transition into a more somber weather pattern invites thoughtful preparation; with night temperatures dipping into the low 50s, a light jacket or sweater will serve well against the shy chill. As you plan your afternoon, consider immersing yourself in a local café, cozying up with a book or savoring that artisan latte you’ve been meaning to try. Alternatively, join the gathering of life in the nearby parks, where the quiet camaraderie of picnickers and the laughter of children weave a communal tapestry until the rain arrives to serenade the city into cozy tranquility.
